channel.title: Error Connecting
channel.description: Hello Moparscape i need help with my webclient i made one and when i try to login it works fine but when other people it gives them error connecting and im sure the ip is changed inside the client and i released a client.jar and it works fine here is the webclient link www.extremescape.smfnew.com please help me
